author: Cody Diehl
comment: Epic. Just beyond epic. Though unfortunately for me, I do believe there is a current bug with either android 6.0.1 or CM13 because any screen recording applications instantly cause a system reboot. So like the screen recording apps I have tried, when I press start now it instantly reboots my phone sadly. I am going to further troubleshoot and look into this issue more then I'll contact you. In case it is a limitation with android marshmallow. Regardless you get 5 stars as this is as I said. Revolutionary.
title: This will be revolutionary.

author: John Watson
comment: However, please clarify. DOES THE PHONE NEED TO BE ROOTED, or is Root access just for this apps permissions. ( my G note 3 is NOT rooted). Thx all. (And keep up the great work! )
title: Trying to get this to work, looks promising.

author: Michael Stasney
comment: Not currently working with moto 360 sport paired with galaxy j3 (6). I am keeping it installed and waiting for updates.
title: Love the idea

author: Douglas Rauda
comment: It's not perfect but still deserves 5 stars just because of the possibilities.
title: Amazing!

author: bunna tang
comment: it is a must have app. Big thumb up the dev of this app.
title: perfect app for android wear
